# Results
```{r}
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
Data <- read_excel("WIID_28NOV2023.xlsx")
Data <- Data |>
  mutate(region_un = ifelse(country == "Turkiye", "Europe", region_un))
```

